items.title: Broadcom Gets Second $420 Target as CPO Win Boosts Outlook
items.description: Broadcom shares are taking a breather after hitting a record high. However, one Wall Street analyst just matched the firm's highest price target ever.

items.title: PepsiCo’s Deep Discount Will Soon Evaporate: Buy It While You Can
items.description: PepsiCo's 4% dividend yield won't last much longer, as Q3 results affirm its long-term trajectory, indicating a stock price rebound can begin soon.

items.title: Bargain Alert: DraftKings Is the Most Oversold It’s Ever Been
items.description: DraftKings’ RSI just hit an all-time low below 15. With analysts bullish and big buyers already starting to snap up shares, the selloff looks overdone...
